channel.title: Delta Green: Divergence (Casefile Critical Carbine)
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog, I present the next post in my series looking at the planning and prep for my recent DG campaign-- this time exploring the second mystery, one which riffs on an adventure from *Arkham Detective Tales* . https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/delta-green-divergence-casefile-critical-carbine

item.title: Delta Green: Divergence (Casefile Critical Carbine)
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog, I present the next post in my series looking at the planning and prep for my recent DG campaign-- this time exploring the second mystery, one which riffs on an adventure from Arkham Detective Tales .

THE GAUNTLET

Delta Green: Divergence (Casefile Critical Carbine)

For the first part of this series see here.Â  INTERLUDE AND CITY For my second Delta Green mystery I wanted to do something less rural. The players' feedback after Session 1 suggested they wanted an...
